3.sentence: Ginny's up today Sir may I help you

5.sentence: he had to go to our other store can I help you

6.sentence: we've also been there and I found a big hole in the mattress when it was delivered we've been mine for the past ten years from your store I can't believe you sell something like that to a loyal customer

7.sentence: we appreciate your loyalty towards our store I'm terribly sorry for that I can't leave our warehouse the shipping damage piece of furniture

8.sentence: well they sure did I just told you the date don't you believe me

9.sentence: I'm sorry Sir I didn't mean that you weren't telling the truth I meant that I was surprised that we did that do you have your sales receipt

10.sentence: you've got to have a sofa by Wednesday my Darling I will be coming to stay with us on Wednesday

11.sentence: yes Sir we'll take care of it for you I'm sure we can fix the problem
